
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53249590">
<br>
<br>
<font color="#6b6b6b"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font style="font-size:16px">《洗冤录详义》为清代许梿编撰。全书共四卷，其内容参考《洗冤集录》及《无冤录》、《平冤录》等各家专著，结合当时的案例和办案经验编成。该书是宋慈《洗冤集录》之后又一部中国的法医学代表作。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#6b6b6b"><font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &amp;quot"><font style="font-size:16px"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font face="system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Segoe UI, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, Microsoft Jhenghei, Microsoft Yahei, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif, apple color emoji, segoe ui emoji"><font color="#6b6b6b"><font style="font-size:16px">部分内容如下图，喜欢的带走吧</font></font></font><br>
